newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: IBCA affirms S.Africa UAL domestic ratings.
newsitem.headline: IBCA affirms S.Africa UAL domestic ratings.

text.p: Rating agency IBCA on Monday reaffirmed UAL Merchant Bank Ltd's domestic short term rating at A1 and long-term rating at A-minus.
"The ratings indicate a high capacity for timely repayment in the short-term and a low expectation of investment risk in the long-term," IBCA said in a statement.
IBCA said UAL's performance remained relatively strong despite below-expectation contributions from some of its operations.
But systems enhancements nearing completion at the bank were expected to lead to improved profitability in underperforming areas, IBCA said.
The ratings agency said UAL's asset quality remained strong. The investment bank is a unit of Nedcor Ltd.
